sense.def: Alternative Names chan hou xue xie 產後血邪 , blood evil following delivery; chan hou xue gong 產後血攻 , blood attack following delivery; chan hou xue chong 產後血沖 , blood surge following delivery; chan hou xue luan 產後血亂 , blood unrest following delivery; chan hou ben xue bu ding 產後奔血不定 , blood hastening and remaining restless following delivery. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of diseases caused by stagnant blood following delivery. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry wu zhu yu 吳茱萸：下 產後余血 , “It stimulates the discharge of residual blood following delivery ”.
